languages.text: Растянутая между стенами мононить, практически невидимая, взрезает суставы моих крыльев. Примитивная ловушка, но мастерски размещенная. Инерция тела срывает ее, а адаптивные ткани останавливают кровотечение, но крылья беспомощно повисают вдоль тела. Вернуться домой, на вершины шпилей, будет непросто.

An almost invisible monofilament is stretched between the walls. It cuts into the joints of my wings — a primitive yet masterfully placed trap. The inertia of my body breaks it and my adaptive tissues stop the bleeding, but my wings hang limply along my body. It will not be easy to return home to the top of the spires.
languages.original_text: Растянутая между стенами мононить, практически невидимая, взрезает суставы моих крыльев. Примитивная ловушка, но мастерски размещенная. Инерция тела срывает ее, а адаптивные ткани останавливают кровотечение, но крылья беспомощно повисают вдоль тела. Вернуться домой, на вершины шпилей, будет непросто.

languages.text: ほとんど目に見えないモノフィラメントが壁の間に張られている。私の翼の関節に食い込むそれは、原始的だが巧妙に仕掛けられた罠だ。私の体の慣性はそれを壊し、適応組織が出血を止めるが、翼は体に沿ってぐったりと垂れ下がっている。家に、尖塔のてっぺんに帰るのは容易ではない。
languages.original_text: An almost invisible monofilament is stretched between the walls. It cuts into the joints of my wings — a primitive yet masterfully placed trap. The inertia of my body breaks it and my adaptive tissues stop the bleeding, but my wings hang limply along my body. It will not be easy to return home to the top of the spires.

traits.locale_text: ほとんど目に見えないモノフィラメントが壁の間に張られている。私の翼の関節に食い込むそれは、原始的だが巧妙に仕掛けられた罠だ。私の体の慣性はそれを壊し、適応組織が出血を止めるが、翼は体に沿ってぐったりと垂れ下がっている。家に、尖塔のてっぺんに帰るのは容易ではない。
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 墙壁之间连着一条几乎肉眼无法察觉的单分子钢丝，深深地切入了我翅膀的连接处。这是个原始而巧妙的陷阱，由于身体的惯性，我的翅膀已经被割坏了。尽管适应组织止住了流血，但我的翅膀却无力地耷拉下来。若是想以这种状态回到巢穴，回到尖塔顶端，恐怕会是件相当困难的事情。
languages.original_text: An almost invisible monofilament is stretched between the walls. It cuts into the joints of my wings — a primitive yet masterfully placed trap. The inertia of my body breaks it and my adaptive tissues stop the bleeding, but my wings hang limply along my body. It will not be easy to return home to the top of the spires.

traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Un monofilamento casi invisible se extiende entre las paredes. Corta las articulaciones de mis alas; es una trampa primitiva, pero colocada con maestría. La inercia de mi cuerpo lo rompe y mis tejidos adaptables detienen la hemorragia, pero mis alas cuelgan sin fuerza junto a mi cuerpo. No será fácil volver a casa, a la cima de las torres.
languages.original_text: An almost invisible monofilament is stretched between the walls. It cuts into the joints of my wings — a primitive yet masterfully placed trap. The inertia of my body breaks it and my adaptive tissues stop the bleeding, but my wings hang limply along my body. It will not be easy to return home to the top of the spires.

traits.locale_text: Un monofilamento casi invisible se extiende entre las paredes. Corta las articulaciones de mis alas; es una trampa primitiva, pero colocada con maestría. La inercia de mi cuerpo lo rompe y los tejidos adaptables detienen la hemorragia, pero mis alas cuelgan sin fuerza junto a mi cuerpo. No será fácil volver a casa, a la cima de las torres.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Ein nahezu unsichtbares Monofilament erstreckt sich zwischen den Wänden. Es schneidet in die Gelenke meiner Flügel. Eine primitive, aber meisterhaft platzierte Falle. Die Masse meines Körpers zerreißt es, und mein adaptives Gewebe stoppt die Blutung, doch meine Flügel hangen schlaff hinab. Es wird nicht leicht sein, nach Hause zurückzukehren, ganz nach oben auf die Türme.
languages.original_text: An almost invisible monofilament is stretched between the walls. It cuts into the joints of my wings — a primitive yet masterfully placed trap. The inertia of my body breaks it and my adaptive tissues stop the bleeding, but my wings hang limply along my body. It will not be easy to return home to the top of the spires.

Die Masse meines Körpers zerreißt es, und das adaptive Gewebe stoppt die Blutung, doch meine Flügel hangen schlaff hinab. Es wird nicht leicht sein, nach Hause zurückzukehren, ganz nach oben auf die Türme.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Je vole droit sur un monofilament quasi invisible tendu entre les bâtiments qui entaille mes ailes. Un piège des plus primitifs, mais redoutablement efficace. L'inertie de mon corps coupe net le fil et mes tissus adaptatifs arrêtent le saignement, mais mes ailes pendent désormais mollement dans mon dos. Je risque d'avoir le plus grand mal à rentrer chez moi, au sommet des tours.
languages.original_text: An almost invisible monofilament is stretched between the walls. It cuts into the joints of my wings — a primitive yet masterfully placed trap. The inertia of my body breaks it and my adaptive tissues stop the bleeding, but my wings hang limply along my body. It will not be easy to return home to the top of the spires.

languages.text: Duvarların arasına neredeyse görünmez bir monofilament gerilmiş. İlkel olmasına rağmen ustaca yerleştirilmiş olan tuzak, kanatlarımın eklem yerlerini kesiyor. Bedenim çarptığında tuzak kırılıyor. Duruma uyum sağlaması için geliştirilen dokularım kanamayı durdurmasına rağmen kanatlarım gevşekçe sallanıyor. Kulelerin tepesindeki evime dönmek kolay olmayacak.
languages.original_text: An almost invisible monofilament is stretched between the walls. It cuts into the joints of my wings — a primitive yet masterfully placed trap. The inertia of my body breaks it and my adaptive tissues stop the bleeding, but my wings hang limply along my body. It will not be easy to return home to the top of the spires.

Bedenim çarptığında tuzak kırılıyor ve duruma uyum sağlaması için geliştirilen dokularım kanamayı durduruyor ancak kanatlarım gevşekçe sallanıyor. Kulelerin tepesindeki evime dönmek kolay olmayacak.
